website_summaries.verdict: A versatile thermometer well-suited to a variety of household and industrial needs.
pros: Provides fast readings and is easy to use with a highly readable screen
Temperature range of -58°F to 1022°F and distance-to-spot ratio of 12:1
cons: Makes an irritating beep with every pull of the trigger

customer_reviews.title: Died After 6 Months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great - while it worked (for 6 months). Now it only displays "Err" when trying to take a reading. It started giving off erroneously high readings (122 degrees instead of 74). I thought it might have been the battery failing so I replaced it with a brand new battery that I knew was good and it worked again for about another hour. Now, just reads "Err". It was never dropped or abused - always kept inside (30% humidity/74 degrees).
customer_reviews.author: D. Downin

customer_reviews.title: Keep your dog safe...know the ground temp
customer_reviews.text: Great to use to treat the ground my dog is about to walk on. Paws are more sensitive then people realize and I want to keep my dog safe. I bought a 2nd to give to my local dog shelter for the same purpose. Gotta admit I syndromes use the laser to year my Lab. He loves to chase the red dot
customer_reviews.author: Croz Mom

customer_reviews.title: This is great!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this thermometer mainly for making soap. I no longer have to have 2 or more thermometers in the work areas. When I first used it, I double checked it with my meat thermometer and the readings were exactly the same. My meat thermometer is good but the temperature fluctuates back and forth a degree or two. This gives me almost immediate temperature. I DO STIR my oils and my lye water a little so that I get a good internal temperature, but I had to do that with other thermometers. No clean-up needed.
customer_reviews.author: garf

customer_reviews.title: "Don't work properly"
customer_reviews.text: This Infrared Thermometer, does not work correctly, does not show the correct temperature, also i notice that when I stand up and move away from the surface I want to measure the temperature, it shows different temperature in the same area. it's better to spend a little more and buy an Infrared Thermometer that's worth it
customer_reviews.author: RonnyS21

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and helpful
customer_reviews.text: This is the best. I can’t stop testing things! I got this because I live in Phoenix and we have dogs. I wanted to understand how hot concrete, asphalt, grass etc really is so I would know when it’s safe to walk them. This works great.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice Construction but Worthless When it's not Accurate
customer_reviews.text: The build quality was nice and the unit looked decent. I installed the battery and tried it out on the wall beside the thermostat. The thermometer read about 9 degrees too low. I went outside where the temperature was 103 degrees. Pointing the thermometer at the driveway I expected something hotter than the air temp but again it read too low -- 96 degrees. I put a pan on the stove and brought the water to a boil. The reading through the water to the bottom of the pan was less than 200 degrees with the water boiling. I returned the unit and am wondering if the more expensive versions are any more accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Bullwinkle56

customer_reviews.title: Great for making soap and...
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these that I sue when I make soap. It is very accurate and easy to use. My grandson would not leave it alone when he visits. He visits often so I bought a second one for him to play with when he is here. It keeps him occupied for hours. He has to check the temperature of everything. Even though it is probably not recommended as a toy, it is a great learning tool for a young child and I don't lose my soap thermometer every time he drops in. Win Win
customer_reviews.author: M Albright

customer_reviews.title: Wanted one for years.
customer_reviews.text: Well, this was really a good deal and it's like a new toy for a grown up. I must have pointed and read a zillion things this weekend. Can't believe I waited so long to just get one, I feel that the measurements are really spot on too. Yay, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: CallmeJack

customer_reviews.title: Excellent way for accurate,safe temperature readings
customer_reviews.text: This is my "best friend" when making soaps! I love this easy and accurate way to check the temperature. Very light weight and has a lifetime warranty when you register it! Excellent price and I've already had a friend ask where I got it!
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Settle

customer_reviews.title: Totally inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I just received my brand new Helect infrared thermometer and it is terrible. I have a digital and an analog thermometer with a probe which are always within 1-2 degrees of each other. This Helect device I got from JETECH Global Group is never closer than 6 degrees F of either one of them. I put a brand new battery in it and it made no difference. I've returned it and Amazon refunded my purchase immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Consumer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I use this for work a lot. Tempering chocolate and checking sugars on the stove. So much easier and cleaner than using a basic immersion candy thermometer. So easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia D

customer_reviews.title: Good thermometer for home use
customer_reviews.text: I don't believe that this kind of infrared thermometer is very accurate, but the inaccuracy will not matter to me for most of daily use, if it fill in 5 degree range. So under this condition, I am very pleased with my purchasing for this device. Easy to use, battery running and lasting long time. I test ed it on several items home, the read out temperatures are good for me. Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: limbo

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use, inexpensive, multiple uses.
customer_reviews.text: I bough this to test my car AC, but it can be used for cooking and many car applications. You can use this instead of the back of your hand to test if something is hot before you pick it up or touch it. Fun to test random things like cats body temp, pool or beach water, just about anything. The laser is just for aiming, nothing else. The actual sensor rays or whatever are invisible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall works well. My only reason for not giving this item 5 stars is that the laser is significantly off center. The measuring field is 12:1 so theoretically if I am measuring the temp of something 48 inches away then the field of measure is a 4 inch diameter circle on the object. However at that range the laser beam is pointed well outside that 4 inch circle. Not a huge deal, you just need to compensate and know where you are pointed.
customer_reviews.author: JTH

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This is a basic infrared thermometer that has a bunch of functions that might be useful, but are hardly necessary. I use it to measure the stone temperature in my outdoor Ooni pizza oven. I don't know about its accuracy since I have no standard to measure it against, but for my application, close is good enough.
customer_reviews.author: ScottA

customer_reviews.title: acceptable.  Will  buy another if the dog eats this one too.
customer_reviews.text: Left a similar unit on the picnic table and it got munched. sensor read low when first turned on. After a couple of days it seemed to track in. Compared it with a digital food thermometer on several surfaces. The food thermometer tracks well with the thermostat setting in the house. It will be useful for finding hidden springs in trout streams (that's where they hang out in February ;-), re-seasoning cast iron cookware, checking for overheating on outboard motors, and suchlike. I would have to evaluate further before I would use it to monitor printed circuit reflow temperature or photo chemicals. The cats love the laser pointer, and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: anti-social media

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly and was affordable
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and was affordable. I needed this to gauge the temperature of bath water so I could get consistent heat to it without it being too hot or cold. This works perfectly for that and now ever bath is the same temp. I also debated buying one of the pricier options but was glad I didn’t spend $15 or $20 or more. This does exactly what I need it to do reliably and for $12 it was hard to pass up. Lastly, the laser makes for an awesome cat toy, as others have mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Comes with battery. Easy to load battery. Easy to turn on and operate. Automatically turns itself off after a few seconds. Can't say how accurate it is, but think it's pretty accurate. Definitely more accurate than my thermostat! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Cool

customer_reviews.title: Effective, accurate, attractive, affordable, fun to use, lifetime warranty- no brainer
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned one of these but really glad I bought this one. I needed it for measuring heat on a soldering iron and film covering iron, for model building where temperature is important. But when it arrived I spent a few minutes measuring things: the snow outside (22°), the hood of the car (still warm at 53°), the wheels of the car (22°), my hand (71°), my face, (92°), inside the fridge (51°). Really fun! Nicely made, easy to use, works well so far, and a lifetime replacement warranty, good looking... What's not to like? Oh... Really inexpensive too. So glad i got this, my new, enhanced skills tool!
customer_reviews.author: Skypix

customer_reviews.title: If it keeps him cooking,  buy it ladies!
customer_reviews.text: What man doesn't need every item known to man for their outdoor kitchen and 5th wheel? So i bought this for the husband and he says it works great and is accurate. I think he just likes getting new things.... but who am I to deny him every toy known to man, because he's making great meals and keeping me out of the kitchen!!! Win/Win!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: This device is very comfortable in the hand. Accuracy seems quite good too. I measured my freezer and refrigerator and the temperature displays on those matched the readings from this device within one degree F. Not sure I could ever put to the test the impressive stated temperature range though.
customer_reviews.author: Arisaka38

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tool to Have
customer_reviews.text: The tool is very helpful around the house. I've used it already with a big satisfaction - checking air coming from the vents, air lost due to windows/doors gaps etc. It is easy to use and very clear to read the measurement on the display. The lighted display - if needed - is a big plus for darker rooms. Overall I'm happy with it and I would recommend it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Valdi

customer_reviews.title: Price Gouging
customer_reviews.text: Since the outbreak on the coronavirus pandemic, laser thermometers have increased by 300-400% price increase. This needs to be handled right away. I use it for my business but whatever it is used for, even a virus, is should be lowered to help prevent this and help each other out but they are more worried about their pocket then the lives of human beings.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie B Domenech

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This tool is nice and lightweight, just what I need as a senior. Very easy to switch from Centigrade to Fahrenheit and I tried in on a stove burner and it worked so I am expecting the same thing when I check the temperature of my M&P soap base...Great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Diva J

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Great quality for the price. I actually thought I was going to get some flimsy plastic frame with a cheap LED screen that didn’t light up.... But actually the product was made of a strong plastic frame and the LED screen lit up and was of good quality. The laser works well and I can attest it’s accuracy on a macroscopic level is superb. That means confirming its accuracy at obvious temperature differences 70F (outside) to 270F (in oven) is easy. Confirming the accuracy to within 5 to 10 degrees Fahrenheit is more difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This does not work at all. Nothing. It took forever to get the included battery attached an inverted into the thermometer, but now that it is, there is no electricity happening. It could be that the battery is bad. I’ll. Try with another, but right now, this thermometer is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Al Gib

customer_reviews.title: Battery dies if you do not unplug it
customer_reviews.text: Pros - Easy to use. Clean txt and easy to read. Accuracy is close enough. (If you want to measure body temp, this is not the one. This will have hard time to read the accurate temperature of your skin.) - Laser point is very helpful. Cons. -Battery dies if you do not unplug it completely. Every time when I tried to re-use it, the battery was dead. This happened 3 times in the 5month period and I ended up spending more money on 9v battery than the actual product.
customer_reviews.author: H_CA

customer_reviews.title: Highly inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Measuring air coming out of AC vents, found this product to be highly inaccurate. In the shop we have 5 infrared thermometers, all of different makes, but all read within 1-2 degrees Fahrenheit of each other. This item is off by 18-12 degrees at best. Will be returning it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: finally got one. yay!
customer_reviews.text: ive been wanting one of these for quite some time. i was happy to come across this one while perusing amazon at a good price. i really like it. its so easy to use and i can actually see the numbers without my readers :) as far as accuracy, i cant say yet because i havent used it for making candy yet so havent dug out the regular old candy thermometer to compare. i did use it while making candles and since they turned out well im assuming the temp was accurate. this is so handy to have for so many things. ive only just begun =)
customer_reviews.author: karen tallo

customer_reviews.title: Great for testing pans
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, point and shoot and get an instant reading. My son has measured just about everything in the house to see it's temp. Kept a 12 year old busy for an afternoon lol. I use it mainly for determining if pans are hot enough to start cooking or if they are TOO hot to add butter. I hate it when my butter burns too quick or if my food just sits in a too cold pan and doesnt crisp. Because i use many different weight pans and have an ancient electric stove, it is hard to know how hot the pan is. Love this temp gun for cooking!
customer_reviews.author: Wheeziecat

customer_reviews.title: Broke 5th time I used it.
customer_reviews.text: Laser stopped working about the 5th time I used it. It worked pretty good the first few times. Now it still reads temp but no laser to know for sure what I'm gauging.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Riley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this specifically to determine how hot our front door gets and to check the accuracy of my oven. The front door gets excessively hot and the oven temperature is off by around 50 degrees. Our front door now carries a warning and a request to use the back door and I increase the required temperature so the oven is at the correct temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Be carefull when changeing the battery!
customer_reviews.text: The connection is VERY tight. I have had three of these and could not get the new battery to seat on 2. Use it when I grill and also to ck my RV and Tk tires for heat buildup when I am traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Flaboy35

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate readings. Crap product.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for the first day. A month or so later it reads ridiculously high. I promise my living room floor is not 118* It was cheap and it is cheap. Trash.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Not doing its job what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Receive this put the battery in laser did not work temperature all over the place I guess you get what you pay for will not buy from this company again
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Arato

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thermometer to read the temperature on my new pizza oven. It works well, but the temperature fluctuates up and down a bit. I get the idea of approximately what temperature the oven is (it goes up to 900 degrees). It might say 435 then 415 then 465 a few times before I just shut it off. It would be better if it read a particular temperature and beeped.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Eisenberg

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Accurate
customer_reviews.text: When measuring this against another cheap IR thermometer and conventional thermometer we have it doesn’t seem to be very accurate. There are some items that I know the temperature of that when measured, it will be off by about 6-7 degrees. It’s a shame
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Small and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Small enough to take on a service call and use to check register temperatures in offices and homes. I use it on HVAC calls and it is easier than climbing a ladder to check ceiling registers for proper air flow and even temperatures. Also works great to check circuit breakers for heat indicating a large current draw or poor connection. Keep in mind it checks surface temperature not internal.
customer_reviews.author: Sid Young

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Inaccurate by up to 10 degrees
customer_reviews.text: The measurements seemed way off, but at the the time of purchasing it, I didn't have anything else on hand to use for testing. After using a digital thermometer and multimeter with a temperature probe, I can see this IR Gun is nearly 10 degrees off actual readings. Really wish I had been able to better test it when it was first purchased, I would have returned it immediately. Unfortunately I am stuck with a piece of junk that doesn't work right at all.
customer_reviews.author: AKnight

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to keep a check on my water temperature in my pond to determine when to feed and not feed my fish. I love this thing...so easy to use and accurate. For the money, you can't beat this. The only draw back is you have to be within 14" of your target but for me...that's not a problem. Highly recommend depending on how you are going to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Hargrave

customer_reviews.title: This is a GREAT affordable surface thermometer!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy I found this thermometer!! I used it to determine the temperature of our new pier, which was advertised as one that would not burn your feet in the summer. We registered temps over 140' and we were able to exchange our pier tops with no questions or hassle, after asking the pier maker to purchase this same thermometer and do their own experiment. :) Thank you for providing a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after three tries
customer_reviews.text: It broke the third time I used it and because I never opened it for approximately three weeks then used it I’m past any refund so money wasted and product light simply stopped working. I don’t think there is any accuracy to readings now.
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: Easy, intuitive use
customer_reviews.text: Really simple to use. Checked accuracy first on a boiling pot of water, then opened the oven and shot it when putting in a pizza just to see if it was accurate. It was within 5 degrees F. Use it for checking cylinder head, crankcase and exhaust port temperature on motorcycles, cars and outdoor equipment. Grand daughter uses it for playing with the cats with the laser. Really inexpensive, and it works.
customer_reviews.author: Zoie

customer_reviews.title: sort of worked first time but not accurate
customer_reviews.text: sort of worked first time but not accurate. Was going to check accuracy against an instant read thermometer and it wouldn't work. Will return.
customer_reviews.author: Two fat ladies

customer_reviews.title: Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Installed battery. Didn't work. Read instructions. Still does not work. Will update if it starts working or is replaced.
customer_reviews.author: rodney rowe

customer_reviews.title: Easy  to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and accurate on different surfaces that should have (and have) the same temperature. I used this to select the material for our new dock. Put the samples in the sun and measure the temperatures. And yes light colors are generally cooler but there are surprising differences in similar shades.
customer_reviews.author: Markus W. Germann

customer_reviews.title: Stop the beeping!
customer_reviews.text: It does what it is supposed to do. I haven't noticed an errant readings, but the beep when letting off the trigger is making me insane. I'm about to open the case up and snip the speaker wire. WHY do you need it to beep?! I can see what the temp is on the screen, STOP BEEPING!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: J. Futchko

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: When we purchased this—the description was a bit misleading. Looks like the seller later clarified this thermometer cannot actually be used for people.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Cali

customer_reviews.title: No go for me
customer_reviews.text: Built cheaply in my opinion. A little off on the degrees. Wish I would have went up in price but was only using for grilling.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin G.

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: i thhave to update this do not buy doesn't work at all very cheap i won'd advise people not to buy it just waiting your money ink it's working but changes temp constantly when you measure the temp fluctuates a lot so can't recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Must have for grilling!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool to have for grilling. My husband uses it all the time. It is also my dogs favorite new toy. So much so that he won’t come inside until we click it and then tears into the house to chase the red dot...lol. I’m so how thinking that it could be used in a dog training scenario...lol. I know we can get him to go anywhere we point the red dot at.
customer_reviews.author: CCH

customer_reviews.title: Great product very affordable would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this a 5-star review but it is lacking The Hanger that most of them come with so you can hang it on the wall. I am making one myself that will get the job done but it would have been nice if it came with the little string hanger at the bottom of it.
customer_reviews.author: Merissa

customer_reviews.title: Seems accurate enough for every day use
customer_reviews.text: I use it to check the water temperature in community pool and jacuzzi. Compared to medical use thermometer, it registers within less than 1/2 a degree difference. Fun to use. The cat or dog might chase the red dot the marks the point of aim. Good price. Amazon has another winner. HR
customer_reviews.author: JJDVD Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This temp gage is very accurate. The only reason I did not give it a 5 star it seems some what cheap. I think it if fine though. Be side the cost was much lower than many other brands. I did rate it 5 star for the money. Also 5 star easy to use & 5 star accuracy. Maybe I should have given it a 5 star over all.
customer_reviews.author: marsha fitzgibbon

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Works..we bought for our child to use. He never points it at people or animals. He is rough on it and abuses it. Themoniter is still in tact with no problem. We homeschool so a great tool to see how temperature can change on items, left in a car, on a sidewalk...etc
customer_reviews.author: Son and Mom

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken!?
customer_reviews.text: Utter disappoinment. Installed the battery only to find out that product doesn't event turn on. Attempted several times to get this thing to work with no avail. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: joe yang

customer_reviews.title: perfect for Pizza Oven
customer_reviews.text: I like because have a good range if you want to use for real Pizza Oven. Can reach high temperature and very fast to read it I used even for some improvement work in the house with the AC, I like that can have even F and C p
customer_reviews.author: Pocc

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use and gives a pretty good reading, however it is far from super accurate. I’m also not convinced the laser is calibrated right but it’s still being used and getting the job done. If you want a cheap temp gun that gets the temperature “close enough” get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use - allows a quick assessment of leaks and insufficient insulation
customer_reviews.text: Just received yesterday and put to use. Having new windows and siding installed in FL home. It allows me a quick check on proper sealing/caulking. Haven't checked accuracy but for me here in hot FL summer - the leak is either there or it isn't -- a degree or so doesn't matter. It is a not high end - simple, cheap plastic housing so probably not very rugged - wouldn't want to drop but of course that isn't the plan :) Meets my needs and for the price a qreat value!
customer_reviews.author: T Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Can only speak for myself but was wanting to get more than one use from this as it was cheap. Pull the trigger after it was stored in the drawer and nothing. Put a new battery in it and nothing. Nothing from nothing leaves nothing. A waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: C75

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use to check the temperature of a 22" cast iron skillet while frying chicken. The laser feature works well when trying to read the temperature of specific areas. Also, I had a refrigerator that someone had moved the temperature setting to warmer by accident. I reset the temperature control to colder and placed a commercial thermometer in the refrigerator to assure it was set to 34 degrees. I double checked my new Helect Infrared Thermometer Gun and it was spot on accurate reading at 34 degrees the same as the commercial thermometer. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Don A.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to read and use. Have to be honest I can’t access the accuracy, but it is pretty precise. It seems relative accurate based on perceived temperature, and I never ran into trouble relying on its reading (I use it primarily for cooking)
customer_reviews.author: Len901

customer_reviews.title: False advertising by omission of scope of use
customer_reviews.text: The device description was recently changed stating not for humans. I had to purchase another item since it was intended to measure client temperature prior to office entry. Another red flag about purchasing items from China.
customer_reviews.author: william agrait

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk, dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk, used it about 3 times when first purchased just pulled it out of a drawer after 6 months and it will no longer turn on even with a new battery. Didnt make it a whole year even. Save your money and dont buy this for more than a one time use.
customer_reviews.author: Chris wysner

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The IR thermometer is simple and easy to use. There is a laser pointer to show where you are sampling the temp, but for close range you don't need it. There is a backlight for the display for low light situations. Just point and shoot. I don't have a way to check it's accuracy but have no reason to doubt it, but I still downgraded it to 4 stars because I haven't checked it.
customer_reviews.author: John N. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have
customer_reviews.text: From what I can tell, this is accurate. It’s quite sensitive; you can hold the trigger and sweep an area, and watch the temp change. Be aware that the readings may be affected if the air is warmer than the object you are measuring. In that case, just get as close as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Shadowphone

customer_reviews.title: Great thermometer
customer_reviews.text: This has been very handy. I'm painting my house and the paint has a temperature range. Even though the ambient temperature is in range the sun heating the house causes it to rise above. This thermometer has come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Infrared Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: used it as soon as it arrived. checked air conditioning vents to test air flow temp ....device worked perfectly! easy to read and understand!
customer_reviews.author: Mark V Carter

customer_reviews.title: Easiest way to read temperature and any Room or area
customer_reviews.text: This item was recommended by someone we met at the reptile convention. We needed to maintain a particular temperature in a reptile cage enclosure. She has one and absolutely loves it and referred us. My son uses it and absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Caravaggi

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tool/toy! I recently had central heat and air installed in my 90 year old house. Thinking that the back room wasn't even getting cool air I bought this for some proof. After checking all the vent it proved what I needed to see. It's fun to see what the temp is at all over the house. Very useful
customer_reviews.author: Joe Dirtè

customer_reviews.title: Lasers are fun
customer_reviews.text: Angle of the laser determines accuracy of reading. I use mine under a flash dryer (screen printing) so it has to be used at a sharp angle. I’ve found that adding about 20 degrees Fahrenheit to the reading when taken at a 35ish degree angle is about right. Have to keep this in mind so I don’t scorch shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work from the jump. Keeps flashing “AL, AH” when I try to get a reading. No info on what the issue could be. Will be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Mila

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn accurate and cheap
customer_reviews.text: The product is useful for checking water temperature. We have to do a water tempurature check periodically once a day and at a different location every day throughout the week. I have checked it against other devises and found it to be accurate. For the price, it's well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Product works as stated. Very easy to use and lightweight. Per the error limit stated in the manual it is acceptable as I am not needing something with less than a 2% error limit. There are products with less error limit to accuracy if that is what someone needs, but you pay a lot more for little benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Darek G.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for - okay, that's expected
customer_reviews.text: I mainly use the thermometer to monitor the temperature in different areas of the refrigerator. The thermometer itself is fine and does the job. The laser, which seems basically to function as a pointer and to play no part in determining temperature, works intermittently at best. Yes, I've used the laser's on off button. Yes it sometimes works - maybe 10% of the time; or maybe it's just shot, now, and will never work again. I've had this thing for a couple of weeks; it serves it's purpose, but it was delivered defective.
customer_reviews.author: David Shohan

customer_reviews.title: No more COLD Fast Food!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I ordered a Fast Food meal and EVERYTHING was cold. Took it to another Fast Food today. One of my "supposed to be HOT" items was 84°F. Needless to say, there was no question about getting the problem corrected. Yes, I'm crazy & tired of bad (old & cold) Fast Food! Thermometer works GREAT! Seems to be excellent value
customer_reviews.author: Steve B.

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to read wax temperature for home made candles. Love it. It's light and fast. Seems accurate so far. The batteries were a bit of a pickle to get in the compartment, but I had no other issues.
customer_reviews.author: Yara G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent IR thermometer for the money
customer_reviews.text: Slightly low temp reading, but readings are consistent, so an adjustment can be noted. For the price, it does the job well. Good to monitor dragging brake caliper, cylinder misfire, fish tank temp, etc
customer_reviews.author: JPTL

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to check the temperature on my motor home brakes. It works great. Point and pull the trigger and you're provided with a temperature. No idea what the accuracy is, but I'm assuming it's close enough. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: defrue

customer_reviews.title: Saved me money.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something inexpensive to test a short in my BMW. Had a feeling it may be the faulty door handle. Worked perfect. Detected excessive heat and saved me a lot of money having a dealer troubleshoot.
customer_reviews.author: Jetmom23

customer_reviews.title: Arrived On Time Without Some of the Troubles Others Stated
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. I had no trouble with the battery fitting in the handle like some others have had. Easy to use. Seems reliable. Haven't given it a good testing on my car yet (which is what I bought it for) but expect no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy inaccurate temperature readings.
customer_reviews.text: Very inaccurate. It says my body temperature is 91 degrees Fahrenheit. Dont buy. It's cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Lavins

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for soap making and I Love it! This is a very good product. I would definitely recommend this product over the conventional thermometers. This is a quality product that has a great price. Definitely recommend to anyone who wants a great thermometer!
customer_reviews.author: rrimas

customer_reviews.title: Infrared Thermometer, Excellent ....
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I would recommend it to anyone needing one. I will ultimately end up using to check tire, wheels and hubs on my Tear Drop Trailer as I travel. On stops to check temps to be sure all is well. Then when camping will use to check temps of oil for deep frying and other...
customer_reviews.author: W. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: continuous light beam with low battery consumption
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item primarily to watch my cats do antics as I play the beam around for him to attempt to catch it. It is excellent for this. It is also accurate as described by seller, and instructions. This is my second purchase of this item (one for the house and one for the RV).
customer_reviews.author: City Boy

customer_reviews.title: Multiple uses.
customer_reviews.text: I love that this came be used in various modes and that I can use it in the kitchen and outdoors on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia R.

customer_reviews.title: Good but must understand how it works!
customer_reviews.text: Works great!! The end user must understand the technical limitations of such an apparatus. instruction manual explains this in a non the technical jargon. I would recommend this as the price is lower than competing ones without any compromises.
customer_reviews.author: Jill&U

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool for finding temperature abnormalities in your home!
customer_reviews.text: I am using this unit to see if I have cold spots in my home that need better insulation. My grandson also thinks it is pretty cool. He found out that south facing sides of a tree are 20% warmer than the north facing side of the tree.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool
customer_reviews.text: I did not give it 5 stars for accuracy because I just don't know for sure. It seems right, I mean the hotter or colder I think something is, the hotter or colder it reads. I'm satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and accurate
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband who loves to cook and uses meat thermometers to make sure the food is cooked through. First time he used this he triple checked with the thermometers you insert. It was exactly the same. He now uses only this one. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Sapp

customer_reviews.title: distance temperature reading for clients due to CORONA VIRUS 2019 but inaccurate- Returning
customer_reviews.text: Incorrect on human body temperature reading, I am returning this one.
customer_reviews.author: honolulujin

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate enough for most kitchen and garage uses
customer_reviews.text: I tried two of these thermometers. Both would often read more than 10 degrees F off from other known good thermometers. A +'/- 10 degree range might be good enough for your purposes, and if so this would be a great thermometer. Inexpensive, and incredibly quick to use. However, I can't think of anything I might need to take the temperature of where a 20 degree range of accuracy would be acceptable
customer_reviews.author: M Sideburns

customer_reviews.title: not very accurate.
customer_reviews.text: unit is several degrees off. No way I see to calibrate it. I am going to return it. Says you can use for cooking. With the error of this unit you will ruin anything you attempt to use this on.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell J Day

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS THERMOMETER. I use it for my grill all the time. I’ve also used this for our HVAC unit, and found out it wasn’t working properly before it got too out of hand. Cheap buy for all the benefits I get!
customer_reviews.author: Tariq

customer_reviews.title: Works excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This infared thermometer is exactly what you would expect when ordering from the description. It is very comfortable to hold, and even came with batteries so it was ready to go right out of the box! I use it to measure the temperature of my solutions while making soap and it has done a great job!
customer_reviews.author: Hillman312

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good build quality, convenient thermometer for low precision measuring
customer_reviews.text: Did not expect this to have as nice of fit and finish as it does, plastic feels pretty decent and it feels solid in the hand. Nice and simple to use, good for ballpark measurements and finding hot-spots, not for anything that requires precise temperature measurement. The same goes for the more advanced thermal imaging cameras, infrared can run into sources of error like emissivity. My only complaint is that the thermometer beeps when you release the trigger which I don't particularly think has any use and annoys somewhat. If it was easy to take apart and remove/disconnect the speaker I would do it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick G

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to use to check engine temps at different spots on inboard diesels. It’s an old boat and the gauges need to be replaced. Soon. In the meantime this sensor has worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for herbal medicine making
customer_reviews.text: Stop accidentally boiling your honey and/or oil infusions. Better for medicine making than even a candy thermometer! Only had it a week, so I can't speak to its durability, but seems likely to hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: shiny

customer_reviews.title: I have become a fudge master
customer_reviews.text: I love this because I have always had difficulty using the "soft ball stage" test. My last two batches of fudge have turned out perfectly by using this thermometer!
customer_reviews.author: Charity Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Test Temps throughout my tank
customer_reviews.text: I'm restarting my aquarium Habit once again and love the idea of a high tech source for checking water temps Stickers fall off the glass and bobbing thermometers only register one level in the tank Now I can test my whole tank
customer_reviews.author: Persnickety periwinkle

product_meta.title: Helect (NOT for Human) Infrared Thermometer, Non-Contact Digital Laser Temperature Gun -58°F to 1022°F (-50°C to 550°C) with LCD Display

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
